alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 26 at 3:06AM EDT until May 26 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of Big Bend Florida and Panhandle Florida, including the following areas, in Big Bend Florida, Coastal Bay. In Panhandle Florida, Calhoun, Central Walton, Coastal Gulf, Holmes, Inland Bay, Inland Gulf, Jackson, North Walton, South Walton and Washington. * WHEN...Through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Portions of the watch area have received 6 to 8 inches of rain since yesterday with an additional 3 to 4 inches possible through tonight. Locally higher amounts may occur. This may lead to dangerous flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
